attributes.action: Parent and Child parking space proof
attributes.additional_details: I am so annoyed at trying to find a space big enough to get my baby in and out of the car because people park there just so they don't get their cars scratched.
attributes.background: Provide people with badges to prove that they can park in parent and child spaces, the same as disability spaces.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the providers of parking spaces.

We could accept a petition calling for a scheme similar to the Blue Badge scheme for new parents, but you might want to be aware that acceptance of these badges are still a matter for individual parking providers. You can find out more here

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/the-blue-badge-scheme-rights-and-responsibilities-in-england/the-blue-badge-scheme-rights-and-responsibilities-in-england#where-can-i-park
